mapper.sql: id, classroom, teacher_id, course_id, time_map, student_id, type, state, week, year, term
mapper.select:
select
from teacher_course_student where teacher_id = #{teacher_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY time_map

select
from teacher_course_student where course_id = #{course_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY student_id
mapper.insert: insert into teacher_course_student (id, classroom, teacher_id, course_id, time_map, student_id, type, state, week, year, term) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeMap,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{term,jdbcType=TINYINT})

update teacher_course_student
classroom = #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
